opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: N. H. Lyons & Co., Inc. v. Isador Lubin, as Industrial Commissioner of the State of New York

opinion:
355 U.S. 284

78 S.Ct. 342

2 L.Ed.2d 271

N. H. LYONS & CO., Inc., appellant,
v.
Isador LUBIN, as Industrial Commissioner of the State of New York.

No. 614.

Supreme Court of the United States

January 6, 1958

Messrs. C. Dickerman Williams and Henry Alexander, for appellant.

Messrs. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Atty. Gen., of New York, John R. Davison, Sol. Gen. and Roy Wiedersum, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.
